channel.title: Need help with an error (317 Client Crashed)
channel.description:
This is the error I get: [code]Welcome to a Blank Client by Stupit! # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a486, pid=2924, t id=2860 # # JRE version: 6.0_20-b02 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a486] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Mike.Mike-PC\Desktop\YewScape\Client\Client\Client\hs_err_pid2924.log
# # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
The file hs_err_pid2924.log says: [code]# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d84a486, pid=2924, tid=2860 # # JRE version: 6.0_20-b02 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (16.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x5a486] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #
--------------- T H R E A D ---------------
Current thread (0x000000003db3a000): JavaThread "CompilerThread0" daemon [_thread_in_native, id=2860, stack(0x000000003dee0000,0x000000003dfe0000)]
siginfo: ExceptionCode=0xc0000005, reading address 0x0000000000000000
Registers: EAX=0x0000000043ca1e70, EBX=0x00000000448290b0, ECX=0x0000000043ca1e40, EDX=0x000000003dfdc620 ESP=0x000000003dfdc1c0, EBP=0x0000000044880ba0, ESI=0x000000003dfdc620, EDI=0x0000000043ca1e40 EIP=0x000000006d84a486, EFLAGS=0x0000000000010206
Top of Stack: (sp=0x000000003dfdc1c0) 0x000000003dfdc1c0: 000000000000006e 000000006db94bf2 0x000000003dfdc1d0: 000000004619cba8 000000006db85c5f 0x000000003dfdc1e0: 000000003dfdc620 0000000000000000 0x000000003dfdc1f0: 0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0x000000003dfdc200: 0000000043cd5888 000000006dbd7cc5 0x000000003dfdc210: 00000000448290b0 0000000000000002 0x000000003dfdc220: 000000003dfdc620 0000000043ca1e40 0x000000003dfdc230: 000000003dfdda40 0000000000000000 0x000000003dfdc240: 000000003dfdc620 000000006dbd6f14 0x000000003dfdc250: 00000000448290b0 0000000000000003 0x000000003dfdc260: 000000003dfdc620 0000000043ca1e40 0x000000003dfdc270: 000000003dfdda40 000000003db357e0 0x000000003dfdc280: 000000003dfde3f0 000000006db3ddf8 0x000000003dfdc290: 00000000448290b0 0000000000000001 0x000000003dfdc2a0: 00000000448290b0 000000003dfdda40 0x000000003dfdc2b0: 0000000000000000 000000006dc8b39b
Instructions: (pc=0x000000006d84a486) 0x000000006d84a476: e0 48 8b 41 08 4c 8b 60 08 48 8b 68 10 4c 8b f1 0x000000006d84a486: 49 8b 04 24 49 8b cc 45 0f b6 f8 48 8b fa ff 10

--------------- P R O C E S S ---------------

time: Sat Jul 03 10:26:20 2010 elapsed time: 252 seconds
[/code]
I got this error when I attacked a man I spawned. The client crashed. Can anyone help?

item.title: Need help with an error (317 Client Crashed)
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Im not too sure but i believe its your computer, maybe try a different version of java. Sorry i cannot help more.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with an error (317 Client Crashed)

item.title: Need help with an error (317 Client Crashed)
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

This is the error I get:

[code]Welcome to a Blank Client by Stupit!

A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:

http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp

Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
